segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on drying that plate, it's almost comical.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she doesn't even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach those cookies, and I'm worried he might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting patiently for her share, it's actually quite sweet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they've done this before, sneaking cookies when the woman isn't looking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks so unstable, it's making me really nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a slow-motion disaster about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so oblivious, it's almost impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn't pull the whole jar down on top of himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so innocent, just waiting for her cookie, it's adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but laugh at the absurdity of this situation, it's like a comedy sketch.
segments.speaker: PAR
